Plot: When a group of hard-working guys find out they've fallen victim to their wealthy employer's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence.
Title: Tower Heist
Actors: Ben Stiller, Eddie Murphy, Casey Affleck, Alan Alda
Writer: Adam Cooper (story), Bill Collage (story), Ted Griffin (story), Ted Griffin (screenplay), Jeff Nathanson (screenplay), Eric Ehrenhaus (concept)
